@@ -825,3 +825,6 @@ - *

Since the number of bytes may be greater than - * Integer.MAX_VALUE, the {@link #getBytesRead()} method is now - * the preferred means of obtaining this information.

+ * @implSpec + * This method returns the equivalent of {@code (int) getBytesRead()} + * and therefore cannot return the correct value when it is greater + * than {@link Integer#MAX_VALUE}. + * + * @deprecated Use {@link #getBytesRead()} instead @@ -831,0 +834,1 @@ + @Deprecated(since = "23") @@ -851,3 +855,6 @@ - *

Since the number of bytes may be greater than - * Integer.MAX_VALUE, the {@link #getBytesWritten()} method is now - * the preferred means of obtaining this information.

+ * @implSpec + * This method returns the equivalent of {@code (int) getBytesWritten()} + * and therefore cannot return the correct value when it is greater + * than {@link Integer#MAX_VALUE}. + * + * @deprecated Use {@link #getBytesWritten()} instead @@ -857,0 +864,1 @@ + @Deprecated(since = "23")
